attributes.action: Make Scuba diving (PADI), Rock Climbing, Skiing and Parachuting compulsory skills that every school should teach
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stark warnings in James Lovelock’s Gaia theory highlights one fact: the effects of carbon emission are now irreversible, it is therefore futile to even attempt to repair something if mankind has gone well beyond the tipping point, as we so clearly have. Consequently, humanity must now prepare for the ultimate showdown: surviving Earth's lands, airs and waters. Unfortunately, our limbs have yet to evolve naturally to tackle these frontiers, so until then, every effort must be made to ensure this generation, the next, and all those who arrive thereafter, are equipped and armed to survive nature’s wrath; schools should be given the tools and training to dispense these skills to every student so that they are given opportunity to save themselves when the time comes, currently these activities are regarded as leisurely pursuits or sports, but due to high costs and the exclusive nature of these activities not everybody is able to partake, weigh this up against the real cost – lives dying –  and money must not be a hindrance, no expense ought to be spared in preserving the lives of today's children so that they can become tomorrow's people.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
